page.title: 07HOUSING & HOME LIFE
page.content:
LOMOND CRESCENT (Council Houses)
The number of people per house was { {TWO}.{DOGS}made the most popular pets in the street.People were partial to {VARIOUS}foods.
THE STABLES (Council Housing)
Most houses had{THREE}occupants.{DOGS} were the most popular pets.{ONE} telephone was most popular with the residents.The majority of people used{ {GAS.}People had{VARIOUS}food preferences.
THE PALACE (Private Housing) { {FOUR}was the average number of people per house.{DOGS}were the preferred pets.{SPAGHETTI}was the favourite food.
